name: Churp
overview:
Using add-ons from your telecom, Churp allows you to make phone calls, anytime to anywhere in North America, for just 5 cents / minute.

Churp works very similarly to a long distance phone card. By giving each user their own personal virtual number and combining it with any add-on that makes one or more local numbers unlimited to call, users can get a much cheaper talking rate than otherwise possible.

Churp allows users to dial out when they call their own virtual number, and redirects all calls to the virtual number from everybody else to their personal cell. Since all calls are routed through the virtual number, and the virtual number is unlimited to make and receive calls from, users are only charged 5 cents / minute to call anywhere in North America.
